password match error: The password is not the same
confirm-exchange-message: You are exchangin your money as fallows:
waiting-for-admin-approve-text: Please wait for admin to approve
wait-admin-to-pay-text: Please wait for admin to pay
edit-message: Are you sure you want to change your amount from
cancel-deposit-message: Are you sure you want cancel the deposit request
cancel-transfer-message: Are you sure you want cancel the transfer request
cancel-withdrawal-message: Are you sure you want cancel the withdrawal request
cancel-exchange-message: Are you sure you want cancel the exchange
xbarat-description: Xbrat is a network of those who want to transfer their money from their place of residence to another country; As these people get to know each other, the middleman called exchange is removed and people can directly enter into transactions with each other and make their transfers with currencies that can be traded in the system
help-button-text: Guide to working with the application
spam-check-warning: Be sure to check the spam section of your email
help-2: To create a user in this application, first select the sign up option.
help-3: • Enter your valid and available email.
help-4: • Check the option of agreeing to the rules of Xbarat and click the submit option.
help-5: • Enter the code sent to your email and click submit. (check the spam section of your email)
help-6: • Enter your chosen password twice and click submit.
help-8: To enter your user account, first select the log in option.
help-9: • After entering the email and password, click submit.
help-10: • After logging in to the user account, you will see the rates tables.
help-12: In this step you need to complete your profile.
help-13: • At this stage, you must complete your profile identity information.
help-15: • Then upload the photo of your identity document.
help-16: • At this stage, you will see a different option depending on the location.
help-17: If you choose Iran, you must enter the card number and Shaba number.
help-18: If Afghanistan is selected, it will display the active offices in this country.
help-19: Registration of transaction request - first step (deposit)
help-20: To register a transaction request, it is necessary to select the deposit option.
help-21: • Specify the desired currency, amount and your location and click submit.
help-22: • After registering the request, you can see the status of your request.
help-23: At this stage, the Deposit button is gray, which means that your request has been approved by the admin. Click on the three dots to see more details about your request.
help-24: • Application steps are visible. Requests can be deleted or edited in this section.
help-25: • The Deposit button is blue at this stage, which means that the system is waiting for payment by the customer.
help-26: By clicking on the three dots, you can see that one stage of your application has progressed. At this stage, the deposit receipt must be uploaded by the customer and the desired location must be selected.
help-27: • When you see the uploaded receipt, click submit.
help-28: • At this stage, after seeing the deposit receipt by the admin, the request is approved.
help-29: • The Deposit button is green at this stage, which means that the system has approved the customer's request.
help-30: Now you can see the amount of your money in the wallet.
help-31: Two options, transfer and withdrawal, are activated.
help-32: Registration of transaction request - second stage (sending money)
help-33: After the mentioned steps, exit the application once and log in again.
help-34: • After viewing the proposed rates of other customers, in the Exchange table, enter the desired rate and the amount of money you intend to transfer along with your proposed rate and click the Exchange option.
help-35: • At this stage, the system asks you to confirm the amount and rate of your offer.
help-36: • After confirming the request, you will be redirected to the requests page. On this page, you can see the steps to complete your request.
help-37: • In this section, the request can be deleted or edited.
help-38: • After approval by the admin, the wallet will be charged with the same amount.
help-39: Click the Withdrawal option, you will be redirected to the corresponding page.
help-40: • On this page, enter the amount of money you intend to withdraw from the system, other options will also be completed.
help-41: • Withdrawal request can be seen in your wallet. Like deposit request, it is necessary to go through steps.
help-42: • At this stage, you will wait for payment from the other side of the transaction.
help-43: • After depositing, the Withdrawal button will turn green at this stage and the payment receipt can be seen by you.
help-46: • Enter the previous password, then enter the desired new password twice and click submit.
